CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'CS - Customer Referral'), 'CS', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'CS - Event'), 'CS', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'CS - Internal Referral'), 'CS', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Marketing - 3rd Party Referral'), 'Marketing', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Marketing - Internal Referral'), 'Marketing', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Marketing - Online Event/Webinar'), 'Marketing', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Marketing - Physical Event'), 'Marketing', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Marketing - Website'), 'Marketing', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Partnerships - Channel'), 'Partners', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'PS - Customer Referral'), 'Implementation', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Sales - Customer Referral'), 'Sales Direct', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Sales - Event'), 'Sales Direct', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Sales - Internal Referral'), 'Sales Direct', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Sales - Investors'), 'Investors', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Sales - IVAs'), 'IVAs', IF( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Sales - Outbound'), 'Sales Direct', TEXT(LeadSource) ))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Lead Source Summary
